name.baseName: Threonine ; Corn (or other raw materials) ; Fermentation method ; All sizes; NESPS2
苏氨酸 ; 玉米（或其它原料） ; 发酵法 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical method + anaerobic/aerobic combined method + chemical method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management71

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical method + anaerobic/aerobic combined method + chemical method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management71
technology.technologicalApplicability: 使用来自玉米或其它原料的发酵方法生产的苏氨酸用于多种应用，如作为动物饲料添加剂以增强营养价值，在膳食补充剂中，以及可能在制药业中。本数据集代表所有规模的苏氨酸生产过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码14,四级代码1469文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为苏氨酸，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical method + anaerobic/aerobic combined method + chemical method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management84
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物化法+厌氧/好氧组合法+化学法，其效率为84，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水末端治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysicochemical method + anaerobic/aerobic combined method + chemical method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物化法+厌氧/好氧组合法+化学法，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水末端治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisPhysicochemical method + anaerobic/aerobic combined method + chemical method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management78
污染物指标总氮的末端治理技术是物化法+厌氧/好氧组合法+化学法，其效率为78，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水末端治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical method + anaerobic/aerobic combined method + chemical method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management71
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物化法+厌氧/好氧组合法+化学法，其效率为71，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水末端治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
